seed_pair.target: No voy a esperarte. ¿Por qué no?
seed_pair.known: I'm not going to wait for you. Why not?

S0072: Pienso que estás haciendo muy bien
I think that you're doing very well.
S0073: Muchas gracias, pero tengo más que aprender
Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.
S0074: Muchas gracias por ayudarme a comprender
Thank you very much for helping me to understand.
S0075: Have you got more to learn?
S0076: Estoy muy feliz con cuánto he aprendido ya
I'm very happy with how much I've learnt already.
S0077: Estoy sorprendido de lo rápidamente que estoy comenzando a comprender
I'm surprised at how quickly I'm starting to understand.
S0078: I don't understand what you said.
S0079: When did you start to learn?
S0080: No estoy seguro de cuándo estaré preparado
I'm not sure when I'll be ready.
S0081: When do you want to start?

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
